TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlySpan`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class ReadOnlySpan

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: 提供任意記憶體之連續區域的型別安全和記憶體安全唯讀表示。

span.span: Provides a type-safe and memory-safe read-only representation of a contiguous region of arbitrary memory.

remarks.format: `ReadOnlySpan` 已[ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type)配置堆疊上，可以永遠不會逸出至受控堆積。`ReadOnlySpan` is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type) that is allocated on the stack and can never escape to the managed heap. Ref 結構類型有一些限制，以確保它們無法提升至受控堆積，包括，它們無法 box 處理，擷取在 lambda 運算式中，指派給變數的型別、 指派給`dynamic`變數，並不能實作任何介面類型。Ref struct types have a number of restrictions to ensure that they cannot be promoted to the managed heap, including that they can't be boxed, captured in lambda expressions, assigned to variables of type , assigned to `dynamic` variables, and they cannot implement any interface type. A`ReadOnlySpan`執行個體通常會用來參考陣列的元素或陣列的一部分。A `ReadOnlySpan` instance is often used to reference the elements of an array or a portion of an array. 不同於陣列，不過，`ReadOnlySpan`執行個體可以指向受管理的記憶體，原生記憶體，或在受管理的記憶體堆疊。Unlike an array, however, a `ReadOnlySpan` instance can point to managed memory, native memory, or memory managed on the stack.

remarks.format: 這個方法會有危險性因為它**不會檢查**下列的錯誤條件：This method is dangerous because it **does not check** for the following error conditions: - `length` 參數不正確。The `length` parameter is incorrect. - `obj` 參數為 null。The `obj` parameter is null. - 物件`obj`指向可能包含原始指標。The objects `obj` points to may contain a raw pointer.

remarks.format: 如果`source`並`destination`重疊，在整個`source`一樣將它複製到暫存位置複製到之前處理`destination`。If the `source` and `destination` overlap, the entirety of `source` is handled as if it was copied to a temporary location before it is copied to `destination`. 如果`destination`長度小於`source`會複製任何項目，則方法會傳回`false`。If the `destination` length is shorter than `source`, no items are copied and the method returns `false`.
